channel.title: Spider Walking Glitch
channel.description:
This is simple,
The Requirements are: Finished Monkey Madness & Have a friend with 75 Magic +.
What you do:
Turn yourself into a monkey... Count to about 5. Get your freind to tele-other you. Then Teleport yourself somewhere. Boom, You walk like a spider.

item.title: Spider Walking Glitch
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:9, topic:116065”][quote author=Try Me link=topic=165358.msg1542349#msg1542349 date=1182800505]
Well,

Its not really a spider, its sorta like a private server walk, when its glitching… or w/e

[/quote]
I know im just saying thats how retarded people on the official forums are…
you constantly see posts like:
“i herd u liek got haxed on 6/6/06 and satan came and liek falador went to hell and some of satans frends kild sum ppl and dey were called massuers. anyways dats wut i herd, post if u were der/what time u usually fap”[/quote]
People say 777 is the next 666 lol.

“I R HEARING RUNESCAPE IS BEING H4X AND I DONT WANT MY PHEEHAT GONE SO PLS JAGEX FIX”
